Tunable.name: LINKED_PERK_UNLOCKED_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: A tooltip that will be shown on Perks unlocked because another Perk's linked_perks list referenced them. Lets the user know why this Perk is no longer available for purchase even though they never explicitely bought it. Expected Arguments: {0.String} - The display name of the Perk that unlocked this one.

Tunable.name: PERK_UNLOCKED_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: A tooltip that will be shown on Perks unlocked manually by the user. Expected Arguments: None.
